comment.body:
I cannot reproduce the advertisement in this moment.
However, I see other advertisements that are not blocked because they are transferred via a encrypted connection with non-advertisement-like domain that cannot be filtered by AdGuard.
Therefore, please use a web browser instead of Coupang app.

<details><summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

현재로써는 그 광고를 재현할 수 없습니다.
하지만, 차단되지 않는 광고가 광고처험 보이지 않는 도메인과 함께 어떠한 광고 차단기도 필터링할 수 없는 암호화된 연결을 통해 전송되고 있기 때문에 보입니다.
따라서, 쿠팡 앱 대신에 웹 브라우저를 사용해주세요.

</details>

comment.body:
Hello,

tour and campaign are NOT tracking parameters !

They are only used in affiliates links where "campaign" is the affiliate ID and "tour" is the landing page. Only "track" can be considered as tracking parameter (set by the affiliate, not by CB)

With this rule activated, the link is totally broken and a click on it make a HTTP 404 Error on chaturbate.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www1.wdr.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www1.wdr.de

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, I don't care about cookies

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Videos do not start when using Google Chrome and Firefox. Nothing happens when you press the play button. Problem can be solved only by disabling HTTPS Filtering

For example: 
https://www1.wdr.de/nachrichten/nachbeben-tuerkei-syrien-hatay-100.html
https://www1.wdr.de/nachrichten/abitur-einser-noten-100.html
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://yandex.ru/search/touch/?text=%D0%A1%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D1%83%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B5+%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8&lr=54](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.ru%2Fsearch%2Ftouch%2F%3Ftext%3D%25D0%25A1%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BA%25D1%2581%25D1%2583%25D0%25B0%25D0%25BB%25D1%258C%25D0%25BD%25D1%258B%25D0%25B5%2B%25D0%25BA%25D0%25B8%25D1%2581%25D0%25BA%25D0%25B8%26lr%3D54) ### Comment > Не нашел настроек (семейных dns фильтров блокирующих взрослый (режим для детского телефона) контент) при котором не появлялись в поисковике, а тем более не могли открываются сайты со взрослым контентом. В приложении очень много профессиональных терминов/настроек. Наверное это хорошо, но для рядового пользователя хотелось бы иметь и изи режим - предустановленные присеты, "детский телефон"/"без взрослого контента", а также когда находясь на непотребном сайте кликнув в adguard по кнопке "добавить в заблокированные". Для отправки сообщения в техподдержку опять же много вопросов. Правильней сделать кнопку отправить/экспорт настроек программы с информацией о системе/браузере/настройках браузера в техподдержку. А в общем спасибо за программу. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

В настройках Оперы нужно разрешить расширениям доступ к поисковым страницам.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www1.wdr.de

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, I don't care about cookies

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Videos do not start when using Google Chrome and Firefox. Nothing happens when you press the play button. Problem can be solved only by disabling HTTPS Filtering

For example: 
https://www1.wdr.de/nachrichten/nachbeben-tuerkei-syrien-hatay-100.html

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
It is already blocked by `||cookiebot.com^$domain=~cookiebot.com`. AdGuard Tracking Protection also blocks the cookie related GTM script.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

```adblock

```

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.543

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/hydrograph.php?wfo=dmx&gage=cedi4&prob_type=stage

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

comment.body:
> Не нашел настроек (семейных dns фильтров блокирующих взрослый (режим для детского телефона) контент) при котором не появлялись в поисковике, а тем более не могли открываются сайты со взрослым контентом. В приложении очень много профессиональных терминов/настроек. Наверное это хорошо, но для рядового пользователя хотелось бы иметь и изи режим - предустановленные присеты, "детский телефон"/"без взрослого контента", а также когда находясь на непотребном сайте кликнув в adguard по кнопке "добавить в заблокированные". Для отправки сообщения в техподдержку опять же много вопросов. Правильней сделать кнопку отправить/экспорт настроек программы с информацией о системе/браузере/настройках браузера в техподдержку. А в общем спасибо за программу.

Семейный DNS включает безопасный поиск. Видимо он недостаточно жесткий у Яндекса. Если прямым текстом написать ваш запрос, то результат будет таким:

<details>
<summary>Details</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/221895159-e3330cad-9491-49e9-9ef1-ba024a3b62c4.png)


</details>

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter
